category_subtitle: Seahawks vs Patriots Tomorrow â€” Get Your Snacks Ready!

rounds.pro_tip: FOOD IMPERFECTION: Real nachos and wings have grease stains, uneven sauce, and varied portion sizes. AI party food looks impossibly photogenic.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated â€” buffalo wing platter with celery and blue cheese (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: SAUCE PHYSICS: Real buffalo sauce pools, drips, and has varied thickness. AI sauce often looks like smooth orange paint uniformly applied.
GLASS REFLECTIONS: Real beer glasses reflect their environment â€” room lights, nearby objects. AI glass reflections are often random bright spots.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated â€” packed sports bar with big screens showing football (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: SCREEN CONTENT: Look at what's on the TVs. AI often generates gibberish or impossible game imagery on screens â€” distorted scoreboards, melted players.
CONDENSATION: Real cold drinks show natural water droplet patterns. AI tends to make droplets too uniform or places them incorrectly.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated â€” tailgate party in stadium parking lot (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: LICENSE PLATES: Check license plates in parking scenes. AI generates random symbols that look vaguely like plates but never show real state formats.
LABEL AUTHENTICITY: Real product labels are crisp with readable text and recognizable brands. AI labels are often the giveaway â€” blurry text, invented logos.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated â€” fresh guacamole with chips and game day spread (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: AVOCADO TEXTURE: Real guacamole has chunky, varied texture with visible onion bits and cilantro. AI guacamole is often too smooth and unnaturally green.
EDGE DETAIL: Real photos have clean, natural edges where objects meet. AI sometimes produces halos, smudging, or unnatural blending at object boundaries.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated â€” football jerseys hanging in a row at shop (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: NUMBERS & LETTERS: Real jerseys have consistent fonts and proper numbers. AI jerseys often show distorted numbers, impossible player names, or inconsistent styling.
